input.sentences: the reception is set up | the food is out and the guests have started to arrive .
what a wonderful toast the best man made for the bride and groom .
the groom enjoys dancing with his mom to her favorite song .
the bride is having a nice dance with her dad to the song wonderful tonight .
the party goes on and the dancing continues late into the night .
output.sentences: The buffet is ready for the guests of the wedding.
The daughter is ready to give a speech at the reception,
and two teenagers flirt and smoke in a room out of the way of the main event.
